description: This file defines a React component named VodPage, which renders a video-on-demand browsing interface with featured and recommended sections, handles keyboard navigation, and manages focus states. It imports React, a Carousel component, and mock data for VOD sections.

methods.name: mapToCarouselItems
methods.description: Transforms mock VOD section data into structured carousel items for featured and recommended carousels.

methods.name: VodPage
methods.description: React functional component that renders the VOD page with carousels and handles user interaction.
